chunk-d8b2214d9c8ac101eca13f2fd640c721.description: The Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Plant, also known as the Ukrainian Power Plant, is Europeâ€™s largest nuclear power plant located in southern Ukraine. It has been disconnected from the national power grid due to a fire caused by shelling, raising fears of a potential disaster. The plant is under Russian occupation, and United Nations inspectors are present to ensure its safety and potentially reduce fighting in the area.
